climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging. EWG Verified products are reviewed to ensure they are free from EWG’s known chemicals of concern and adhere to strict health standards.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Purelygreat Tea Tree Stick Deodorant A fresh and effective natural stick deodorant. A natural choice to smell good and feel great about your health. Refreshing Tea Tree scent and long-lasting protection make this a great way to start your day. Tea Tree scent - Created with essential oils Long lasting protection Provides 3-4 months of daily protection Vegan | Cruelty free | No aluminum | No parabens | Triclosan free EWG VERIFIED For Your Health - 2019
EWG Verified For Your Health EWG VERIFIED means that this product avoids EWG’s ingredients of concern, is committed to full transparency and operates under good manufacturing practices.

Ingredients: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride (derived from coconut oil and glycerin), Sodium Bicarbonate (baking soda – neutralizes odour causing bacteria), Cetyl Alcohol (vegetable based – emulsifying agent), Cocos Nucifera (coconut) oil (skin conditioning agent), Zea Mays (corn) starch (absorbs odour), Glyceryl Stearate (a fatty acid from vegetable fats and oils – Eco-Cert emulsifier), Cetearyl Alcohol (a mixture of cetyl and stearyl alcohols from vegetable sources – Eco-Cert emulsifier), Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate (natural food grade – Eco-Cert emulsifier), Euphorbia Cerifera (candelilla) wax (extracted from Euphorbia cerifera, a shrub native to Mexico – emulsifier), Zinc Ricinoleate (derived from castor seed oil – deodorizer) Essential oils: Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) leaf oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (lavender) oil, Geraniol*, Linalool*, Limonene* *natural components of essential oils Directions: Apply 2-4 swipes gently down the center of your armpit until smooth.

Lavender Scent Our Tea Tree scented stick deodorant is made with only pure essential oils! Clean Ingredient List While not all these ingredients are found in your kitchen, they are all natural, clean and healthy. Our EWG Verified certification proves it! Silky Smooth Our formula goes on silky smooth - pamper your pits! Long Lasting Formula Keeps you smelling your best all day long!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FINALLY, one that WORKS!!!
reviews.reviewText: Hooray!!!! I am soooooo thrilled to finally find a non toxic, aluminum free deodorant!For the past 2 decades, I've tried pretty much 'all' the major healthy aluminum free and not anyone of them worked for me with stopping odor.Used this for a week or more now and have experienced ziltch odor!! If anything changes after my trip to the Caribbean where it's more humid and hot, I will update this post.I am THRILLED to finally have found one and I recommend it to others!Jun 20 Edit for continuation:I'm back from the Caribbean and it was 102-104 w heat index ...VERY humid and happy to report this deodorant worked!! Underarms did not sweat and zero odor! I found my brand :-)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product works, smells good, and has no harmful chemicals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It smells great and goes on nicely, but unfortunately did not work for me. It did the opposite! I hardly perspire to start out with and was pleased to find something so natural. However, after using it I started noticing a sweat odor on myself! It really surprised me as that hardly ever happens! After three weeks I stopped using it and the odor stopped. I was better off using nothing as this product seems to activate something in my body to promote the odor. I guess it's not for every "body"!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent lower tox deodorant option
reviews.reviewText: Likes1. Spread easily2. Safer ingredients used3. Does not crumble or break easily even if dropped (always a plus for me)Dislikes1. Masked some smell, but doesn’t cover it up entirely2. Tea tree scent isn’t my favorite

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Ingredients are clean which is exactly what I am looking for in a deodorant, however the smell was a bit of a change for me. I do believe it works well- it’s been 3 weeks now of use and no issues. Only reason for the 4 stars is the seemingly strong minty smell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works just the same as the original but is much easier to apply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lasts a long time
reviews.reviewText: Floral scent that lasts a long time and doesn’t stain your clothes. 100% pure ingredients ewg verified so no harmful ingredients! New staple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Non-Toxic Deodorant!
reviews.reviewText: Not only is this deodorant way less toxic to your body than Tom’s “natural” Deodorant, it’s also way better performing! I applied it in the morning before a full day or work, then an afternoon CrossFit session, and I still smelled neutral after all of that! My only little nitpick is that it doesn’t slide on your underarm very smoothly and tends to drag your skin a little. Definitely more malleable once it is a little warm. Other than that, I am in love!

reviews.reviewTitle: Just as effective as the cream form, but more convenient!
reviews.reviewText: I had previously been using the cream form by Purelygreat, which I had added vegetable glycerin and bentonite clay to, to dilute the baking soda. It worked great to detox my pits and get used to the baking soda in the deodorant.I wanted to try out the stick version, but was initially skeptical because I had tried many other brands that weren't as effective. I had tried Green Beaver deodorant, which I found to be too sticky, and Schmidt's which I found too waxy (it left waxy buildup on my clothes). I'm glad to say that the Purelygreat stick leaves no residue on my clothes. In minimal activity, I can go almost 2 days with no stink and no reapplication. Super happy with this productThe baking soda might be an issue for sensitive skin but if you can get used to a diluted form like I did with the cream version, you can build up your tolerance.

Previously, I used Speed Stick or some other big brand depending on price at the time my old deodorant would be close to finishing. However, my wife and her friend were talking about natural deodorants a few months back and her friend was saying something about her husband's friend being diagnosed with cancer under his armpits (I didn't realize that was possible). Thankfully, he beat the cancer, but mentioned something about not being able to use deodorant during treatment and couldn't wait to start using deodorant again. My wife's friend was like "Are you nuts?". This guy was apparently surprised and asked meekly, "So, I shouldn't use brand name deodorants?". Wife's friend answered with a "Duh!".So what does this story have to do with this product? Well, apparently, the big brands are loaded with cancer causing chemicals.My wife did some research and purchased another of Purelygreat's deodorants. However, I saw that process of stirring a stick in a jar before applying the deodorant confusing. So instead, she recommended I get this instead. According to her, this deodorant passed some skin care database or something.Frankly, I didn't understand what she meant, but not wanting to drag out the conversation about deodorant while not wanting to put harmful chemicals on my armpits, I bought one of these. It looks like the regular deodorant sticks I normally use. I'm good with that.First thing. I don't smell sweaty during the day. I've checked a few times when I felt sweaty especially during the plus 30 degree days we've been having. I don't smell like a guy in the middle of a 10k.Second thing. I like the smell of tea tree. It's been a while since I've used tea tree products. It's nice.Third thing. This deodorant doesn't go on dry. However, it's not the wet and sloppy one either. It's more in between. I've used both in the past. I don't have a preference. It's something to keep in mind if you like dry deodorant (where you can touch it and snap your fingers immediately) or wet deodorant (where you touch it, try to snap your fingers, and send deodorant gel flying in someone's face).Overall, I like this deodorant.

Not a heavy sweater but still prefer to wear deodorant. Due to sensitivity, I prefer products made from safe ingredients, Bought two fragrances of this product, but gave up on the lavender after a week as the product doesn't hold for me past 5 hours and then there was a strange unusual odour coming from armpits, requiring was and re-apply. Gave it to my husband and started the Floral version, which does the same thing. So will not buy this product again.

reviews.reviewTitle: You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: I like this stick simply because it prevents your under arms to smell bad , it does smell exactly like green tea 😂😂 if you are looking for something that smells sexy too, forget it But this scent I mean and get different scents, other wise I’m really happy that under my arms didn’t small bad at all , very effective with green tea scent 😂😂☺️👍👍👍
So upset, was excited to get this until I got it and it came without a cover
